about_the_game:
Apano SYN Fighter is a action game in the style of the 80s. Face countless waves of aliens, defeat them, and fight your way through each level to the final boss. The game is suitable for absolute beginners to virtuoso combat pilots. A gamepad is the only requirement, and it's even more fun if you invite one to three friends to join you in destroying the alien waves. #action #multiplayer #retro #arcade #shooter #scifi

The demo of Apano SYN Fighter is free to play and is intended to bridge the waiting time until the full version is released. We have unlocked two levels – have fun trying it out!

Multiplayer Coop
​At any time, a new player can connect a gamepad and join you in co-op mode. The alien fleet will be stronger, but you two are an unbeatable team anyway, right? In the full version, you can also add computer-controlled coop buddies by pressing the two fire buttons and the A button. Up to five coop buddies are allowed. You can also start with a specific number of co-ops.

short_description: Is there a gamepad lying around somewhere?!! Ready to play some real shooter games again? Grab the controller and become an APANO SYN PILOT to face the alien invasion. Connect up to four controllers and shoot until you drop. 100% survival chance on "Easy", low on "Impossible".
